title: Meh, it's just like Caitlyn's trap, right? Shouldn't hurt. I'll just walk through.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/321025231e85bf26c4e6e270d9f36615.gif

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/warframe/images/f/f2/Holy_mother_of_god.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130903182236

Will not be making that mistake again.

replies.body:
Do not
Stand
In the Circle

That shit will one shot Goku
https://media.giphy.com/media/fiXi6cRmIxPZS/giphy.gif
Actually its gonna do like 600 dmg with 500 AD lel
"Only 600 damage"
Since he has 500 ad and its impossible to hit without cc... kinda
Good thing the player that stands on the trap gets reveled and Jihn has a long range snare c:
Its still harder to hit than you may think. And even if, the damage isnt THAT special.

nope random trap spells you can leave all over are supposed to chunk 20% of a tanks hp damage (almost all other adc and assassin spells do it even though they supposed to be sustained damage {assassins are supposed to be burst damage but who beleives that when their spells drop down to 3 and 4 second cooldowns}) isnt the special only scale with one stat type and have other stats transfer into the 1 you scale with so you can still get those multitudes of unique item passives.
its not ment to be a spell that you jsut fire off and hit but thats how people will think about it just like vayne isnt ment to be a long range poke your azz off but people will complain that vaynes range is super short
If your trapped in it, then Jhin used two spells, averaging 300 damage a spell. Other marksmen at that point in the game would auto attack you twice and call it a day.
for less damage unless they crit but jhin can trap you use spells and auto
would be more if RIOT didnt Nerf Last Whisper to Bonus armor pen % instead of regular armor pen %
It does magic damage..........
what does it matter, at lvl 18 the base armor is around 40. By then most AD champs have around 30 flat armor pen, + last whisper and you literally melt them

Base armor includes scaling armor, just not armor from items, runes, or masteries. 

So with Thresh being the exception (who has 16 because he has no scaling armor), most champions have around 80-85.
You realize jhin can very, very easily hit 500 AD and beyond.
A full build that actually works right you can get over 700 AD with 100% crit
it does a lot more damage than that, I took 660 damage from one when the jhin was at 2 items...
Hm, with 500 AD it does exactly 260 + 600 + 100% AP, so... likely 0 lol, which is 860. 614 if you have 40 MR.
Why did this get downvoted?
At the time it was like 80 base + 360 AD + 20 AP and I had 311 HP with almost no resistances XD
{{champion:202}}: Looks like I'm going to have steak for dinner
Wow, you nailed Jhin's personality. This creeped me the hell out.

It's a gift... or a byproduct of my autism that allows me to step out of my head, moral barriers, and even basic common scene, to truly connect to the mind of other characters. https://media.riffsy.com/images/a8dd9f23809e90c043abd0476fc2e96c/raw

also thanks for the complement {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Sacrificing a cow. So original. What an artist.

Haha {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Goodnight sweet Ali.
I like how Jhin's so taken back by the beauty of your death

> [{quoted}](name=ArdentEye,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=i9dj130R,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-02-07T05:50:37.075+0000)
>
> Jhin is weak and needs to be buffed.

PFT
*scoff*
*SNORT*
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHHAHA
Like Penns put together, at 500 AD(which is extremely easy to get on Jhin), his trap does 860 damage. So lets say it does some 600-500 damage when you reach two full items. Plus base MR maybe 550-450, and then there's his long-range root if they step on a trap to ensure they take the damage, his AA's which hit like a truck, plus his last which is literally made to mow you down, and an ult that is essentially Rengar from range.
"weak"
"needs to be buffed"
trololololololololo

Why the fuck are you posting on a smurf if your main was plat? Sounds like someone got banned considering no placements have even been attempted after nearly a month of the new season.

Nice try kiddo. Stay toxic af kid. Every account you use will eventually get perma-banned just like you main was.

Edit: I have been plat since season 4. Jhin is strong right now. Everyone has counterplay. Just because you suck as Jhin doesn't mean he needs unnecessary buffs. Git gud "kiddo"

LOL says the guy with a level 20 account because he is too toxic to keep his main. Noob shit. You know nothing and are the true inferior noob here. You're whining about a champion you supposedly have not even tried yet? You are the definition of "bronze rager". You have no actual support for your argument. All you have done is make fun of people who disagree with you. Uninstall this game, you obviously are too toxic to be welcome here in the LoL community. And that's saying something.

> [{quoted}](name=ArdentEye,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=i9dj130R,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-02-07T14:59:14.297+0000)
>
> i learn from experience kido the champ is easy to beat. refer to my main's rank Gaxloom if you have further need to argue

And I learned from experience that even if he misses half his ult shots, you still die if you're anywhere below 3/4 health.

>i really don't like arguing with lesser beings

Yes, I'm the lesser being that calls other humans inferior because of a video game rank.
Rank =/= Game Knowledge
